thread.title: Comment on Report: Panthers expected to have interest in Matt Kalil by thebigkuhuna
thread.title_full: Comment on Report: Panthers expected to have interest in Matt Kalil by thebigkuhuna

author: thebigkuhuna
title: Comment on Report: Panthers expected to have interest in Matt Kalil by thebigkuhuna
text:
Mar 6, 2017 11:32 AM 
That would be great for the brothers if they can play together. 
First, they’ll have to remove the stink. Tomato juice works pretty well. bassplucker says: Mar 6, 2017 11:33 AM 
Never seen a guy fall off after his rookie season like Matt Kalil, and never come back. Good thing Cam is big and can run. Mar 6, 2017 11:35 AM 
Sign him please. katientony says: Mar 6, 2017 11:38 AM 
Our Kalil is OK. Not great…but OK. I wouldnt mind resigning him compared to over paying for someone like Riley Rief from the Lions (who probably isnt a who lot better than Matt Kalil). But at the same time, I’m not gonna cry if he signs elsewhere. 
I might cry about the state of the entire Vikings O-line…but not that one piece. Mar 6, 2017 11:48 AM 
Well, there is one… thebigkuhuna says: Mar 6, 2017 11:55 AM 
It just shows how few of good lineman there are in the league, last year everyone was ready to get rid of Matt, now we need him just to make an average line. Leave a Reply
